neighborhoods.name: Old Town (Staré Město)
neighborhoods.description: Historic heart of Prague with the famous Astronomical Clock, Old Town Square, and medieval streets.
neighborhoods.dining_scene: Traditional Czech restaurants and tourist-friendly cafes

neighborhoods.name: Lesser Town (Malá Strana)
neighborhoods.description: Baroque district below Prague Castle with charming cobblestone streets and beautiful gardens.

neighborhoods.name: New Town (Nové Město)
neighborhoods.description: Modern commercial center with shopping, nightlife, and business district.

neighborhoods.name: Vinohrady
neighborhoods.description: Trendy residential area with parks, galleries, and excellent dining scene.
neighborhoods.dining_scene: Trendy restaurants and craft beer bars
